description.en: Sperax, a Silicon Valley-based blockchain company, is aiming to build a trusted infrastructure for a decentralized economy that may provide far greater efficiency, flexibility and self-governance than the traditional economic model. Sperax provides a layer of financial services within the public blockchain stack through a native stablecoin and decentralized financial service providers.
